feed.title: State of Bitcoin Development: November Brain Dump

entry.title: State of Bitcoin Development: November Brain Dump
entry.summary: In November 2011, Gavin Andresen proposed a solution to address issues with software testing. He suggested hiring professional QA personnel to create and execute test plans. Additionally, he emphasized prioritizing bug fixes over adhering to a release schedule. The latter approach would help ensure the software was tested thoroughly before its release.
